name: Kid-E-Cats: Games For Kids
description:
One, two, three, four, five...

Kittens going on a hike!
Doubts aside, no second thoughts:
Those are classes you will like!

An educative game with Kid-E-Cats is:
- 6 educative topics;
- 18 minigames;
- over 50 objects to study;
- dexterity development;
- logical thinking and memory training;
- fun game tasks;
- perfect for the youngest ones!

With the kittens your kid will learn about:
- ANIMALS
Pudding will tell about cats, dogs, goats, rabbits, horses and other animals! He'll also tell what they eat!
- PROFESSIONS
With Smudge, your kid will study professions: a cook, a doctor, a postman, a builder and even a gardener!
- MUSICAL INSTRUMENTS
The kid will know how they sound and what they are called! Let's play the guitar with Izum? Or shall we play the saxophone? 
- EDIBLE/INEDIBLE
Pudding will tell your kid what's edible and what's not. You can together separate food from inedible items.
- TRANSPORT
Dart will show your kid means of transport: a tractor, a car, a helicopter, a motorcycle and a lot more!
- NUMBERS
Cupcake will teach your kid to count! How many balloons are in the picture? How many apples?

But that's not all there is! In every topic, there are 3 steps:
- the kid will get to know the chosen category better;
- he'll learn to distinguish objects;
- then he'll consolidate the received knowledge by playing educational minigames!
